channel.title: Lag help
channel.description: on my server the lag is horrible, when u clik to walk you walk one square, stop, walk another, stop all the way to you get to where you clicked and its really anoying so how can i fix this?

item.title: Lag help
item.dc:creator: @kyle464 kyle464
item.description:
@kyle464 wrote:

try rebooting your PC and then if thatâ€™s does not work get a new graphics card i had to do it too so then all my lag stop

                      glad too help

Read full topic

item.title: Lag help
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

It is most likely your computer but can be a problem if there are too many things in an area. Say the home has all the shop keepers or all the portals (or both), it would be really laggy.

Read full topic
